description:
Yume, Angela, and Oyamada go to a vandalized shopping district. They discover that a “street mage” has attempted to fix it, but something is causing him to do shoddy work.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: A Mage Who Couldn`t Become a Mage
Mahou Tsukai ni Narenakatta Mahou Tsukai
魔法遣いになれなかった魔法遣い
